name: Darkfire
description:
A fantasy MMORPG I'm writing for Brackeys and the 2020 "finish a game" jams.

On first run, the client will get assigned a GUID from the server which will become your "username" - it will be stored in a text file on your system, so each time you connect you will get the same user.

You can create a character and then join the game.  If anyone else is on you will see them.  Global chat is currently supported - press enter to open the chat window and type your message, then press enter again to send it.

Game requires TCP port 11000 to communicate with server.
